Wed, 11 May 2016 11:02:31 +0000 en-US hourly 1 https://wordpress.org/?v=4.5.2 Trials Set to Resume against Killer Cops of Punjab: SCI vacates stay on CBI trials (2016 Update) http://www.sikhsiyasat.com/2016/05/06/trials-set-to-resume-against-killer-cops-of-punjab-sci-vacates-stay-on-cbi-trials-2016-update/ Fri, 06 May 2016 13:30:06 +0000 http://www.sikhsiyasat.com/?p=1450 Trial is all set to resume against alleged killer cops of Punjab. Many senior police officials of Punjab are also facing charges of murder for killing Sikh youth in Fake Encounters during late 1980s to early 1990s period. The trial in these cases were stayed by the Supreme Court of India for over ten years, but in a recent order the SCI has vacated the stay.

Sikh Siyasat talked to human rights lawyer Advocate Rajwinder Singh Bains on this issue.

]]> New Book “June 1984 Di Pattarkari” breaks myths about role of media: S. Ajmer Singh http://www.sikhsiyasat.com/2016/05/06/new-book-june-1984-di-pattarkari-breaks-myths-about-role-of-media-s-ajmer-singh/ Fri, 06 May 2016 12:33:58 +0000 http://www.sikhsiyasat.com/?p=1447 Chandigarh: The Indian Army attack on the Darbar Sahib was an outcome of the nation building project switched into operation since the British rulers quit the Indian sub-continent, said known Sikh historian Ajmer Singh.

Speaking at the release of the book, ‘Sant Bhinderanwale de Ru-h-bru, June 84 di Pattarkari’, authored in Punjabi by senior journalist Jaspal Singh Sidhu here at Kisan Bhawan, Ajmer Singh said practice showed that shaping a nation-state on the European model, necessitated the demolishing of distinct identities, cultures, languages and other diversities to be replaced by a homogenous dispensation, which better suited to unitary type- central governance.

The Sikhs came into a direct conflict with the Indian state as they insisted on retaining their distinct identity as well their separate political entity as a ‘nation’, he added.

]]> Interview with Bibi Navnit Kaur, after parole of Prof. Devinderpal Singh Bhullar http://www.sikhsiyasat.com/2016/05/06/interview-with-bibi-navnit-kaur-after-parole-of-prof-devinderpal-singh-bhullar/ Fri, 06 May 2016 07:00:26 +0000 http://www.sikhsiyasat.com/?p=1444 Sikh Political Prisoner Prof. Devinderpal Singh Bhullar was released on 21 days parole on April 23 after 21 years of imprisonment. Since his conditional release from jail, Prof. Devender Pal Singh is staying at Amritsar along with his spouse Bibi Navnit Kaur.

Sikh Siyasat talked to Bibi Navnit Kaur about release of Prof. Devinderpal Singh Bhullar, their daily routine these days, about health condition of Prof. Bhullar and her expectations about permanent release of Prof. Bhullar.

]]> Journalist Surinder Singh (Talking Punjab)’s lawyer updates on Ambala Case http://www.sikhsiyasat.com/2016/05/06/journalist-surinder-singh-talking-punjabs-lawyer-updates-on-ambala-case/ Fri, 06 May 2016 01:30:42 +0000 http://www.sikhsiyasat.com/?p=1441 Journalist Surinder Singh, founder of Talking Punjab, has been in Ambala prison for past many months. On April 28, 2016 the Sikh Siyasat News (SSN) talked to Advocate Rajwinder Singh Bains regarding case against Surinder Singh journalist.

]]> Aam Aadmi Party’s Press Conference about Punjab Dialogue – Bolda Punjab [Full Recording] http://www.sikhsiyasat.com/2016/05/05/aam-aadmi-partys-press-conference-about-punjab-dialogue-bolda-punjab-full-recording/ Thu, 05 May 2016 17:47:56 +0000 http://www.sikhsiyasat.com/?p=1453 Aam Aadmi Party held a Press Conference at Press Club Chandigarh to announce the Punjab Dialogue, an interaction programme aimed at identifying issues to frame election manifesto of the Aam Aadmi Party for upcoming Punjab Polls 2017.

This video recording contains highlights of the press conference.

]]> Talk with Human Rights Lawyers On 1991 Pilibhit Fake Encounter of 11 Sikh pilgrims by UP police http://www.sikhsiyasat.com/2016/05/05/talk-with-human-rights-lawyers-on-1991-pilibhit-fake-encounter-of-11-sikh-pilgrims-by-up-police/ Thu, 05 May 2016 17:27:26 +0000 http://www.sikhsiyasat.com/?p=1438 A CBI court in Pilibhit on April 4, 2016 sentenced 47 policemen to imprisonment for life for murdering 11 Sikh pilgrims in a fake encounter in 1991.

Sikh Siyasat talked to human rights lawyers; Advocate Amar Singh, Advocate Navkiran Singh and Advocate Rajwinder Singh Bains, on Pilibhit Face Encounter Case’s decision and related matters.

]]> Discussing Report of People’s Commission headed by Justice Katju on Behbal Kalan Firing http://www.sikhsiyasat.com/2016/04/16/discussing-report-of-peoples-commission-headed-by-justice-katju-on-behbal-kalan-firing/ Sat, 16 Apr 2016 08:13:06 +0000 http://www.sikhsiyasat.com/?p=1428 A People’s Commission headed by former Supreme Court of Indian Judge Justice Markandey Katju was appointed by prominent Human Rights’ organisations of Punjab to hold an inquiry into October 14, 2015 police firing at Behbal Kalan. Two Sikh youth, namely Gurjeet Singh of Sarawan village and Krishan Bhagwan Singh of village Niamiwala were killed in police firing.

Justice Markandey Katju held probe into the incident and the commission issued its report in Chandigarh few days back.

Sikh Siyasat’s presenter Sukhwinder Singh talked to Advocate Harpal Singh Cheema of Sikhs For Human Rights (SFHR) and ex-DGP Shahsi Kant (who was secretary of People’s commission headed by Justice Markandey Katju) about the findings of the report and related matters.

]]> Understanding Indian/ Hindu Nationalism: Speech of S. Ajmer Singh http://www.sikhsiyasat.com/2016/04/15/understanding-indian-hindu-nationalism/ Fri, 15 Apr 2016 11:07:19 +0000 http://www.sikhsiyasat.com/?p=1425 S. Ajmer Singh is a Sikh historian and intellectual. He recently delivered a speech during a seminar held at Punjabi Bhawan, Ludhiana (on April 9). The seminar’s theme was “Nationalism In Contemporary Context” and this seminar was organised by Samvad. This is full recording of Speech of S. Ajmer Singh.

]]> Nationalism In Contemporary Context (Seminar by Samvad) | Full Video http://www.sikhsiyasat.com/2016/04/14/nationalism-in-contemporary-context-seminar-by-samvad/ Thu, 14 Apr 2016 05:51:28 +0000 http://www.sikhsiyasat.com/?p=1420 Samvad, a discussion forum, held a seminar on Nationalism In Contemporary Context on April 09, 2016 at Punjabi Bhawan, Ludhiana. This playlist carries full released recording of the seminar.

]]> Bhai Baldev Singh Wadala on movement against corrupt regime of SGPC http://www.sikhsiyasat.com/2016/04/12/bhai-baldev-singh-wadala-on-movement-against-corrupt-regime-of-sgpc/ Tue, 12 Apr 2016 13:08:10 +0000 http://www.sikhsiyasat.com/?p=1417 Bhai Baldev Singh Wadala talked to the Sikh Siyasat News (SSN) on the sidelines Shaheedi Samagam held in the memory of Bhai Jaspal Singh Gurdaspur on March 29 2016 at village Chaur Sidhwan, Gurdaspur, Punjab.
